desc: Adaptogens are herbs and mushrooms (like Ashwagandha, Reishi, and Cordyceps) that help balance your body’s reaction to stress by balancing hormonal glands . Protect against adrenal fatigue, stress-induced weight gain, and depression with our adaptogenic blends. Our blends include complimentary herbs such as turmeric..

layout.text: Medicinal Mushroom and Herbal Supplements for Holistic Wellness
Our Neuroscientist formulated blends bring together herbal wisdom from ancient healing traditions with premier scientific research.
